product_name: Woolrich Dove Creek Slippers - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep your feet toasty warm in the women's Woolrich Dove Creek Slippers with plush fleece lining and faux fur trim. Rubber soles give you good traction on wooden floors and decks. Uppers are made of Woolrich wool. Soft fleece insole and lining pamper bare feet. Latex midsole offers supportive comfort. Durable rubber sole delivers indoor and outdoor traction. Closeout.
short_description: Keep your feet toasty warm in the women's Woolrich Dove Creek Slippers with plush fleece lining and faux fur trim. Rubber soles give you good traction on wooden floors and decks.
